doc.title: Blood & Thunder
doc.plot: 'No man is an island, but I know a woman who is.' A documentary about Sandy West's Ossabaw Island Project and its cultural impact upon thinkers and dreamers working together in a coastal paradise. 'Sherman's March' participant, Wini Wood (aka the linguist) hosts a tour of her former Ossabaw setting. There are current-day black hats trying to control the island and this project documents Sandy's attempt to keep them honest.
